name: dropbear
description:
Dropbears are dangerous, volatile creatures, constantly trying to explode. You control an explosion nullifying platform and your task is to escort them safely to permanent storage.

This is my entry for the Game Developers League's July Jiggle Jam, my first jam entry ever, and my first released game anywhere.  I only ended up getting to spend around 8 hours on this but it's neat to have actually released something.

Controls:
W, D - move
Space - jump
R - reload level
Escape - pause

Soundtrack:
